dc_title_s: Powles Hook (Paulus Hook), Jersey City, New Jersey 1804
dc_description_s: A map of that part of the town of Jersey commonly called Powles Hook. Actually known as Paulus Hook, a section of Jersey City. Map shows a table of rental rates for lots on each land tract and a description of the elevation of the sections of the land.
dc_publisher_s: P. Desobry's Lithography, 62 Beaver St., New York NY
